backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chatroom backend with access control, blob storage, message/reaction management, user profiles, active user tracking, and HTTP outcalls for media embedding.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four requirements to update progress bar colors to accent blue and show them only on focus for username and room title inputs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, and configuration files describing UI structure, query hooks, styling, and routing logic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, and theme provider setup.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting avatars via file upload, Giphy search with debounced API calls, or removing current avatar with initials fallback.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list with auto-scroll on new messages, reply context handling, and message input integration.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating a new chatroom with topic, description, category selection, and media upload (image, YouTube/Twitch video, or Twitter post). Validates video URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter embed previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, back-to-lobby button (when in chatroom), and user profile section with editable username and avatar picker. Shows character count progress when editing username.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication is not used in this anonymous app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, and media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, images, voice). Supports pinning videos, adding/removing emoji reactions, and replying to messages with scroll-to-message functionality.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat message input with textarea, media attachment support (image upload, YouTube/Twitch video URLs, Twitter posts), and voice recording functionality. Validates URLs, handles upload progress, and manages recording state with timer.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an iframe with an unpin button. Renders video embeds based on media type and URL validation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, and a progress slider for voice messages. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom hook that ensures chatroom data is freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal and resets on actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and identity persistence using @dfinity/auth-client. Provides authentication status, identity object, and login/clear functions to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatroom operations (get, search, filter by category), message operations (get, send, delete, react), and user profile management. Includes helper functions for username/userId management and query key normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-optimized viewport handling, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration file exporting Giphy API key and result limit constants.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers in compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM snapshotting, with in-flight request deduplication and caching.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, versioning, and 7-day expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in session storage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a single chatroom page with loading states, error handling, and automatic view count incrementing. Renders ChatArea component when chatroom data is successfully loaded.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page that displays a list of chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering. Includes create chatroom dialog and handles loading/error states for actor initialization and data fetching.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking four feature requests to make progress bars visible with blue accent color and show them only when users are actively typing in username and room title input fields.
